body: Nice, love to see old Crimson stuff getting some love, they've got amazing stuff that I'd love to see translated

This is an old book by Crimson (Carmine)
Original: https://nhentai.net/g/125871/

Hi guys, I'm on a journey to translate more books. There are so many old books of my favourite artists that never get translated, so I would like to take this opportunity to do so (I'm sure many of you would love more translation too). If you're interested please check out my patreon site and support, would really appreciate it.

Translated by: HMC Translation
Patreon: www.patreon.com/hmctranslate

My Other Translation:
https://nhentai.net/g/319840/
You don't see much yuri rape stuff, pretty good.

poster.username: i read it for the story

body: Remember, rape is ok only in hentai.
